dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form
Class AbstractTableAction

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.core.commands.common.EventManager
      org.eclipse.jface.action.AbstractAction
          org.eclipse.jface.action.Action
              dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.AbstractTableAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jface.action.IAction
public abstract class AbstractTableAction
extends org.eclipse.jface.action.Action

The SWTTable allows to add new table actions to the toolbar of the table. All these actions must implement this interface.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b

doUpdateEnablement

public void doUpdateEnablement()
Called when the selection changed to update the enablement of the action.

Implement and call Action.setEnabled(boolean) according to the state of the action

Since:
2008.b

Implement doRun() instead.
